divs: sighting detailssighting report: at approximately 9 pm on 3-30-05 my 8 yo daughter and i went into our backyard to try to observe the moon for a school project. we were admiring the clear sky and the many stars when my daughter suddenly called out to me - "dad, dad, look - something weird." i had my 9 mo old son in my arms and so wasn t able to move very quickly into the clearing where she was standing. however, when i did look up into the sky i saw what appeared to be two very dim lights (separated by about the width of one\two fingers of outstretched arm and with one very slightly ahead of the other)racing across the sky at an extremely high rate of speed. they almost looked like sattelites, but were moving very very fast but remained in exact same position in relation to each other (as if they were attached). there was no accompanying sound whatsoever. when i asked her what she had seen - she replied that it was a triangle with blinking lights on the tips of the wings. this thing was moving fast enough to cross the entire visible sky in about 4 or 5 seconds. i have seen may meteorites and sattelites but this appeared unlike anything i have seen. my daughter drew a picture of what she saw and it is a black delta with lights on the wingtips. i have heard of giant black deltas, but she certainly has not. i went back outside to look around and i did see an impressive meteorite approximately 5 min later, but this went in opposite direction and the meteorite left a nice trail, whereas this other thing left none. i have never seen a ufo before and i only wish i had seen this thing better. we are in se ohio.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Athens
There were no other sightings in Athens on or around March 31st 2005
